mapper.select: select A.R_FILE_NM , A.R_FILE_PATH , A.R_START_TM , A.R_END_TM , A.R_DURATION , A.R_IO_GBN , A.R_USER_ID , A.R_GROUP_ID , A.R_TEAM_ID , A.R_USER_NM , A.R_STT_DATE , B.status , B.result_date , B.result_rate2 result_rate from rec_call_info A left join recognition_t B on A.r_file_nm = B.r_file_nm where A.r_file_nm like '%'||#{searchKeyWord}||'%' or r_user_nm like '%'||#{searchKeyWord}||'%'
select R_FILE_NM , STT_TEXT , ANSWER_TEXT , RESULT_RATE1 , RESULT_RATE2 , RESULT_H , RESULT_D , RESULT_S , RESULT_I , RESULT_N , RESULT_DATE , STATUS from RECOGNITION_T where r_file_nm = #{r_file_nm}
mapper.update: update recognition_t SET answer_text = #{answerText} where r_file_nm = #{r_file_nm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REC_MST_INFO(R_FILE_NM, R_FILE_PATH, R_STT_MODE) VALUES (#{r_file_nm}, #{r_file_path}, '3')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RECOGNITION_T WHERE R FILE NM = #{r_file_nm}
mapper.update: UPDATE recognition_t SET RESULT_RATE1 = #{result_rate1}, RESULT_RATE2 = #{result_rate2}, RESULT_H = #{result_h}, RESULT_D = #{result_d}, RESULT_S = #{result_s}, RESULT_I = #{result_i}, RESULT_N = #{result_n}, RESULT_DATE = SYSDATE, STATUS = '3' WHERE r_file_nm = #{r_file_nm}
